pageContext.name: magna

frontmatter.title: How To: The Perfect Pour-Over
frontmatter.subtitle: A cautionary tale about people drinking coffee
frontmatter.excerpt: Brewing the perfect cup of coffee is much easier than you think. For under $30 you can brew barista level coffee.

sections.title: I build websites.
sections.content: My name is **Ian Rugg** and I like to build stuff. All different sorts of stuff. But professionally, I build websites with my friends at [Red Van Workshop](https://redvanworkshop.com)!

pages.name: redkap
pages.html:
The Red Kap ecommerce site has been designed from the ground using bleeding edge SFRA from Salesforce.

Built and desinged with my friends at Red Van Workshop, we have implemented remarkable design, functionality and usablility. With countless integrations, Red Kap has been able to advance and imporve their eccommerce presence.

Inline Code and Code Blocks

Blocks of code are either fenced by lines with three back-ticks, or are indented with four spaces.

<!-- Some example CSS code -->
h1 {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
}

Inline code has back-ticks around it.

footer.content:
Yeah yeah yeah, I build websites. But I actually do other things too. I love coffee, all things finance, technlogy, drones, and cars! I live just outside Boulder where I am in the proccess of opening a brand-new coffee shop with my friends.

With the addition of this new website, I will continue to add new content surrounding all the different projects I work on. Oh yeah, I also work for the best company in the world, [Red Van Workshop](https://redvanworkshop.com?ref=ianrugg.com), so you will see projects that I worked on there too!
